Alex Yeates

London based Full Stack JavaScript Developer

I am currently a Front End Developer at Selfridges and Part Time Teaching Assistant at General Assembly.

With experience building and deploying JavaScript APIs and consuming them with a Front End, I can prototype web app ideas and help clients begin on their startup journey.

I also offer tutoring services for people interesting in learning HTML, CSS and JavaScript.


Stack:

LIME CRIME QUIZ | PROFESSIONAL PROJECT

Built for Selfridges to go live with their launch of Lime Crime products in store.

Built with jQuery, HTML and CSS, it was deployed on their CMS and featured on the homepage.

See live >

BALLOON BURST | PERSONAL PROJECT

Built with jQuery, HTML and CSS, Balloon Burst was the first game I built as part of the General Assembly Immersive Web Development course.

Deployed on Heroku, you pop balloons before they reach the top of your screen with their speed increasing over time.

See live >
